Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Leman Russ Tank Executioner
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A variant of the Leman Russ tank, this armored vehicle trades the standard 120mm Battle Cannon for a Plasma Destroyer, a large plasma cannon. Even heavy and super-heavy tanks fear the star-fire that the Executioner brings to bear, and no infantry armor can hope to withstand it. 

Leman Russ battle tanks may not be the greatest tank design around - indeed, a tank design from a glitterworld could stand a very good chance of destroying it. However, its true strength lies in its ruggedness, simplicity, and ease of manufacture and use, like so much else in the Imperial Guard. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
